Name: VRTGO
About the game: VRTGO is the premiere destination for immersive 360º/VR music videos, live performances and musical experiences. Don’t just listen to music: experience it! VRTGO is a truly immersive and creative platform for artists to tell their stories and invite their fans around the world to experience 360º/VR live performances and music videos like never before. Features: 360 music videos from the world’s greatest artists Interactive VR music experiences 360 VR performances and concerts streamed live! Ambisonic sound lets you experience the music in an entirely new way 360º stereoscopic videos immerses you in mind-bending VR Powered by Universal Music Group & VRLIVE
Meta Title: VRTGO: Jun 26, 2017, VRLive and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on VRTGO? Check out the release date (Jun 26, 2017), developer insights from VRLive, and a complete game summary.
